column5:
The title says it all. Not comprehensive (yet). I'm only listing the films I've seen so far. Hoping to one day make this is a 1001 Queer Films You Must See Before You Die list, but we'll see...

We've got films covering any identity under the queer spectrum - docs, films, stand up and shorts. Wide variety of the queer lens here. Some aren't the best examples of queer films or certain communities, but I feel a lot of these have at least some good queer quality to them that is significant. I've also put in a few titles that are controversial because I feel like their inclusion also add to the scope of the genre.


Please give me suggestions for more. I'm trying harder to make it more diverse (which means less stories about cis white males, and more of well, everyone else)

column2: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert

The Bitter Tears of Petra von Kant
Come Back to the 5 & Dime, Jimmy Dean, Jimmy Dean

Hello Mary Lou: Prom Night II
I Don't Want to Go Back Alone
Matt Shepard Is a Friend of Mine
A Nightmare on Elm Street Part 2: Freddy's Revenge
Professor Marston and the Wonder Women
Queens and Cowboys: A Straight Year on the Gay Rodeo

Taqwacore: The Birth of Punk Islam
This Film Is Not Yet Rated
To Wong Foo, Thanks for Everything! Julie Newmar
